marketplaces.name: plurlab
marketplaces.description: PlurLab Claude Code plugins - agentic workflows and Serena integration

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "plurlab",
  "owner": {
    "name": "Hunter Luisi",
    "email": "hunter@plurlab.com"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "description": "PlurLab Claude Code plugins - agentic workflows and Serena integration",
    "version": "1.0.0"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "serena-system",
      "source": {
        "source": "github",
        "repo": "hluisi/SerenaSystem"
      },
      "description": "Serena project lifecycle - init, audit, maintain, insights. Integrates with Serena MCP.",
      "version": "0.1.3",
      "keywords": ["serena", "mcp", "codebase", "memory", "documentation"],
      "category": "development",
      "skills": [
        "./skills/serena-system"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "systema",
      "source": {
        "source": "github",
        "repo": "hluisi/SystemA"
      },
      "description": "Agentic workflow system - design-first development, TDD, debugging, and disciplined collaboration",
      "version": "0.1.2",
      "keywords": ["skills", "tdd", "debugging", "design", "agentic", "workflows"],
      "category": "development",
      "skills": [
        "./skills/building",
        "./skills/debugging",
        "./skills/designing",
        "./skills/dispatching-parallel-agents",
        "./skills/finishing",
        "./skills/planning",
        "./skills/receiving-code-review",
        "./skills/requesting-code-review",
        "./skills/subdividing-plan",
        "./skills/test-driven-development",
        "./skills/using-git-branch",
        "./skills/using-git-worktrees",
        "./skills/using-systema",
        "./skills/validating-design",
        "./skills/validating-plan",
        "./skills/verification-before-completion",
        "./skills/writing-skills"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
